Html: How do I activate this using this API, I was able to successfully create a working schedule but unable to activate this.
Use the TaskLogonType.S4U value when registering the task.
Hi dahall, thanks for the info, but how do i do that, can you give me an example? Thanks, appreciate the help.

ts.RootFolder.RegisterTaskDefinition("Test", td, TaskCreation.CreateOrUpdate,
   null, null, TaskLogonType.S4U, null);
Thanks! Apologies for the late reply, it worked.
Would this work in Task Scheduler version 1.0 as well ?
You'd have to try. v1 was created so long before major part of the authentication mechanisms in the current Windows Server, I cannot predict its behavior.
